alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 09 at 9:50AM MST until March 11 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Lake County and the mountains of Chaffee County. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
